motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of April 28, 2025 City Council Meeting Minutes • SECOND READ: Ordinance to Amend Chapter 6 of the Code of Ordinances to Promote Adoption of Rescue Animals (Paul Leonhardt) • Funding Authorization for Stormwater Repairs at 4836 Summerford Dr (Cody Dallas)

motions.title: Amendment of City Position Allocation and Compensation Chart
motions.description: Approval of amendment to increase all City salary ranges by 4.9% effective July 1, 2025 to avoid compression issues with market adjustment implementation.

motions.title: Authorization of Permanent Easement to Lake Ridge, LLC
motions.description: Authorization of a permanent easement to Lake Ridge, LLC for pond maintenance.
